name: Contested Skies
description:
During WWI, in an alternate timeline, enemy forces have cut all Allied communication lines... except by air. Bring this message to the front lines. Our fate lies in your wings, Pigun.

A short shoot-em-up game for the Southern Student Summer Jam!

Credits:

Ethan Yu (trex)

Daniel Carr (boomo)

Vik Bathala (Eggnog)
